version_description:
Thank you for using Sainsbury's Groceries App.

Features added:
- Recent search history
- Empty trolley (remove all items in your trolley in a single button)
- Remove from favourites (remove an item from your favourites list)
- Changes to your trolley (review the changes to your trolley when an item or promotion is no longer available)

Bug fixes:
- Fixed the issue where you were unable to checkout from the trolley (if there were any changes to your trolley)
- Fixed the issue where you were unable to checkout if you did not provide a default delivery address

Download our updates to be sure you're using the best version.

Thank you for using Sainsbury's Groceries App.

Features added:
- Filters (refine products by category, brand, dietary requirements)
- iPad navigation (browse and list of products appear side by side on the iPad)
- Browse category (drastically improved the speed of navigating the categories)
- Favourites 'Frequency' sort order (sort your favourites by how often you buy them)

Bug fixes:
- General bug fixes
- Fixed issue where the favourites list was not sorting via 'Category'

We’re always making changes and improvements to the App. Update to the latest version to make the most of Sainsbury’s online.

Thank you for using Sainsbury's Groceries App.
